EmailTemplate.name: 2019_EMEAI_Ops_Forum_Istanbul_Irina.201902_EMEAI_Invite_Operators_Conference_Ist
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to join the Honeywell Operators Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS FORUM -Istanbul Edition Dear Customers and Partners,
On behalf of Honeywell Aerospace and our sponsors, I am pleased to invite you to the 2019 Honeywell Operators Forum. Our general sessions and partner sessions are filled with keynotes and demos that showcase our latest technologies, as well as the mandate updates that you don't want to miss. Please see the event details below.
Date: April 16th, 2019 Location: Sheraton Istanbul Atakoy Hotel, Sahilyolu Cad, Atakoy, 34158, Istanbul
Agenda:
<[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_EMEAI_Ops_Forum_Istanbul.html]]>
Time Subject
13:30 - 14:00 Welcome Coffee & Snacks
14:00 - 14:30 Sponsor introduction
14:30 - 15:00 C&PS Presentation, GCC overview & updates
15:00 - 15:30 Honeywell Technology: Mandate, Upgrades & MSP
15:30 - 15:45
The Connected Aircraft -Inmarsat Technology: SwiftBroadband & JetConnex
15:45 - 16:15 Break
16:15 - 16:30
The Connected Aircraft -Honeywell Technology: JetWave, MCS series & Routers
16:30 - 17:00 Honeywell GoDirect™ – bringing the highest quality of connectivity to you
17:00 - 17:30 Protect yourself against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with Honeywell
17:30 - 17:45 Technical brief on the most common cases in the region
17:45 - 18:00 Q&A
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_EMEAI_Ops_Forum_Istanbul.html]]>
We look forward to meeting you!
Jiri Huml Customer Support Manager
